name: Vector Product Format (VPF)
description: The Vector Product Format (VPF) is a standard format, structure, and organization for large geographic databases based on a georelational data model intended for direct use and  designed to be used with any digital geographic data in vector format that can be represented using nodes, edges, and faces.
